formalpara.title: Summary
formalpara.para: Tuning volumes allows you to affect their performance. To tune volumes, you add options to them.

step.para: Select the volume that you want to tune, and click the Volume Options tab from the Details pane.
The Volume Options tab displays a list of options set for the volume.
Click Add to set an option. The Add Option dialog box displays. Select the Option Key from the drop down list and enter the option value.
The option is set and displays in the Volume Options tab.

formalpara.title: Result
formalpara.para: You have tuned the options for your storage volume.
